get.description: Performs a semantic search. The identify user must have this functionality enabled. The syntax of the search is a "home-grown" syntax in which each semantic term is in the form of {Vocab}.{Descriptor}.

parameters.name: Search
parameters.description: Enter search query. Vocabulary name and descriptor/synonym text should be separated by period. Example value: (drug.aspirin or adventmed."paracetamol increased") and not ibuprofen

parameters.name: FieldIds
parameters.description: Content fields to search. Default value is "AllMetadata, Abstract, LibraryFullText". Comma-separated list of possible values: AllMetadata, Abstract, LibraryFullText, FullText.

parameters.name: DateRange
parameters.description: Publication date filter. Default value: ALL. Possible values: ALL, CURYEAR (this year), LAST2 (last 2 years), LAST5 (last 5 years), LAST10 (last 10 years), LAST1M (last month), LAST3M (last 3 months), LAST6M (last 6 months), LAST12M (last 12 months), CUSTOM

parameters.name: PubStart
parameters.description: Start publication date. Used when DateRange = CUSTOM. Format: YYYY (2018) or YYYYMM (201710)

parameters.name: PubEnd
parameters.description: End publication date. Used when DateRange = CUSTOM. Format: YYYY (2018) or YYYYMM (201710)

parameters.name: Genres
parameters.description: Content genres. Default value is [all]. Comma-separated list of possible values: [all], 0 (unknown), 1 (journal), 2 (book), 3 (patent), 4 (proceeding), 5 (bookitem), 6 (issue), 7 (article), 8 (conference), 9 (report), 10 (preprint), 11 (document), 19 (conference paper or section)

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Sorting. Default value is "Relevant".

parameters.description: Sort direction. Default value is "Default".

parameters.name: AZFilter
parameters.description: Prefix title filter. Default value is no filter. Title starts with letter (A-Z).

parameters.name: IncludeAltTitles
parameters.description: Include alternative titles to each content in the response. Default value is false.

parameters.name: IncludeParentData
parameters.description: Include parent data to each content in the response. Default value is false.

get.description: Performs search for Cite It. Similar to RFE basic search but with changed defaults and normalized authors.

parameters.name: LibraryIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of library (with prefix L) or collection (with prefix C) identifiers to search within.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Set of values specifying that the search should be performed on values containing these tags.

parameters.name: TagsOperator
parameters.description: Indicates which logical binary operation will be used to join the tags. Default value is "And".

parameters.name: ExcludeTags
parameters.description: Logical unary operator Not. Default value is null. If Tags is not empty and ExcludeTags is false or null, it indicates that the search should include documents with the specified tags. If Tags is not empty and ExcludeTags is true, it indicates that the search should exclude documents with the specified tags. If Tags is empty and ExcludeTags is false, it indicates that the search should include documents without tags. If Tags is empty and ExcludeTags is true, it indicates that the search should include all documents that have at least one tag. If Tags is empty and ExcludeTags is null, then no filter is applied.

parameters.name: Search
parameters.description: Known item search. Enter Title, Keywords, PMID, ISSN, ISBN, Authors, etc

parameters.name: DateRange
parameters.description: Publication date filter. Default value: ALL. Possible values: ALL, CURYEAR (this year), LAST2 (last 2 years), LAST5 (last 5 years), LAST10 (last 10 years), LAST1M (last month), LAST3M (last 3 months), LAST6M (last 6 months), LAST12M (last 12 months), CUSTOM

parameters.name: PubStart
parameters.description: Start publication date. Used when DateRange = CUSTOM. Format: YYYY (2018) or YYYYMM (201710)

parameters.name: PubEnd
parameters.description: End publication date. Used when DateRange = CUSTOM. Format: YYYY (2018) or YYYYMM (201710)

parameters.name: FieldIds
parameters.description: Content fields to search. Default value: "AllMetadata, Abstract, LibraryFullText". Comma-separated list of possible values: AllMetadata, Abstract, LibraryFullText.

parameters.name: Genres
parameters.description: Content genres. Default value is [all]. Comma-separated list of possible values: [all], 0 (unknown), 1 (journal), 2 (book), 3 (patent), 4 (proceeding), 5 (bookitem), 6 (issue), 7 (article), 8 (conference), 9 (report), 10 (preprint), 11 (document), 19 (conference paper or section)

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: Sorting. Default value is "Relevant".

parameters.name: SortDir
parameters.description: Sort direction. Default value is "Default".

parameters.name: AZFilter
parameters.description: Prefix title filter. Default value is no filter. Title starts with letter (A-Z).

parameters.name: IncludeAbstracts
parameters.description: Include abstract to each content in the response. Default value is false.

parameters.name: IncludeAltTitles
parameters.description: Include alternative titles to each content in the response. Default value is false.

parameters.name: IncludeParentData
parameters.description: Include parent data to each content in the response. Default value is false.

parameters.description: Adds "prepub" or "present" to the Publication Date. Default value is true.

includeAbstracts.description: Include abstract to each content in the response. Default value is false.

includeHighlighting.description: Include Highlighting for each content in the response. Default value is false

includeClips.description: Include Text Clips for each content in the response if available. Default value is false

includeVocabAggregates.description: Include Vocab Aggregates across entire catalog. Default value is false

includeDescriptors.description: Include Descriptors for each content in the response and calculate aggregate across all results. Default value is false

includeLibraries.description: Include shared libraries for the query.

includeAltTitles.description: Include alternative titles to each content in the response. Default value is false.

includeParentData.description: Include parent data to each content in the response. Default value is false.

options.description:
Comma separated list of flags for Lucene Search.
Available options: ON(OFF)EXACTSEARCH On or off exact search for quoted sentences ON(OFF)UISEARCH On or off search behavior like on RFE UI search. Combination of UISERACHFIELDS, UISEARCHTITLEBOOST and UISEARCHWEIGHTS options ON(OFF)UISERACHFIELDS If on pre populates UI default search fields with search fields specific for RFE UI search ON(OFF)UISEARCHTITLEBOOST Enable (disable) specific boosting techniques for a content title like it is currently done for UI Search ON(OFF)UISEARCHWEIGHTS Enable (disable) using UI Search weights (boosting) for Lucene API

quoteOnly.description: Optional. false to place an order. true to get an estimated price quote without actually placing the order. false is the default value.

allowSpecialOrder.description: Optional. true for normal order processing. false to prevent orders that cannot be immediately filled and may require referencing or advanced services. true is the default value.

contentId.description: Optional. Unique RFE content id of the content item to order. Specify 0 or omit if ordering by Citation

copies.description: Optional. Number of copies required. Default value is 1.

useId.description: Optional. The id of the rights alias that defines how the user intends to use the ordered article/publication. Default Value: 0.

locationOverride.description: Optional. Location where content will be used if different from the user's location.

customSpecInstruct.description: Optional. A custom special instruction. Used only if Custom is specified in SpecInstruct

deliveryProfileName.description: Optional. Name of the delivery profile the specifies delivery parameters for this order. If not specified, the user's default delivery profile will be used.

billRef.description: Optional. Client-defined value. CCC does not use this information but it will be associated with the order and available for reporting purposes.

po.description: Optional. Client-defined value. CCC does not use this information but it will be associated with the order and available for reporting purposes.

priceLimit.description: Optional. Maximum cost allowed for this order. It can only be less than or equal to the price limit of your account. When not present, the price limit of the order is determined by your account setup.

expiration.description: Optional. A date or date/time by which the order must be filled. If the order is not filled by this time it will be automatically cancelled. Default is to never automatically cancel the order.

divisionName.description: Required. The name of the division the user is in. If no division is specified, the client's default division will be used.

departmentName.description: Required. The name of the department the user is in. If no department is specified, the division's default department will be used.

locationName.description: Required. The name of the location where the user is located. If no location is specified, the division's default location will be used.

priceLimit.description: Required. The price limit of the user. Specify 0 to assign no limit or specify -9999.00 to inherit the price limit from the user's department, division, or client record.

timeZone.description: Required. Timezone index value. Specify 0 to indicate the default timezone - Eastern Standard Time. A list of valid time zone index values can be found here http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms912391.aspx.

culture.description: Required. Culture LCID value used to determine various culture-dependant display preferences (time/date formats, for example). Specify 0 to indicate the default culture inherited from the user's department/division/client. A list of valid LCID values can be found here http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/0h88fahh.aspx.

languageCulture.description: Required. Culture LCID value used to determine the preferred langauge of the user. Specify 0 to indicate the default culture inherited from the user's department/division/client. A list of valid LCID values can be found here http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/0h88fahh.aspx.

userGroups.description: Required. List of user group names this user should belong to. Values should be separated by a ';' or ','.

viewName.description: Required. The name of the view to be assigned to the user.

billRef.description: Optional. The default billing reference for this user.

billRefEditable.description: Optional. true to allow the user to change their BillRef on orders; false otherwise. Default value is true.

costCenter.description: Optional. The default cost center for this user.

costCenterEditable.description: Optional. true to allow the user to change their Cost Center on orders; false otherwise. Default value is true.

po.description: Optional. The default po for this user.

poEditable.description: Optional. true to allow the user to change their PO on orders; false otherwise. Default value is true.

custOrderNum.description: Optional. The default customer order number for this user.

custOrderNumEditable.description: Optional. true to allow the user to change their Cust Order Num on orders; false otherwise. Default value is true.

allowUpdate.description: Optional. true to allow updating of an existing user that matches by Email. false (or omit the parameter) to only allow additions.
